output_list.reason: Integer overflow in mint function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Integer overflow in transfer function allows a user to have more tokens than the allowed limit.
Integer overflow in transferFrom function allows a user to have more tokens than the allowed limit.
Integer overflow in migrate function allows a user to have more tokens than the allowed limit.
migrate function generates a random value in the migrationAgent contract, allowing attackers to control the migration of tokens.
